---
title: Syntax Highlighting
---

# Syntax Highlighting

Since TemplateDX is a subset of MDX, it works well out of the box with any MDX-based syntax highlighters.

Download Options:
1. VSCode: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=unifiedjs.vscode-mdx
1. IntelliJ: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/14944-mdx
1. Eclipse: https://open-vsx.org/extension/unifiedjs/vscode-mdx
